main.name: Haridas Dutt
main.description: I am a Web developer, YouTuber, and a Gamer.
main.bio:
Hi, I am Haridas Dutt, a 22 years old Web developer, YouTuber, and a Gamer living in Ghaziabad, U.P., India. I am a Computer Science Engineer, currently looking for Software Developer Job Opprtunity. 
 Have a look at my Coding skills, YouTube Channel, or just connect with me on LinkedIn. I am always excited to have a talk with like minded people, lets discuss over coffee.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
